item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司称欧盟对印度纳亚拉公司的制裁 "不合理
item.description: 共同拥有印度纳亚拉能源炼油厂的俄罗斯石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）称，欧洲对该炼油厂实施的新制裁是 "不合理和非法的"。【原文：Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁让华尔街寻找完美的鲍威尔对冲工具
item.description: 周三上午，当全球市场因唐纳德-特朗普总统可能解雇杰罗姆-鲍威尔的消息而颤抖时，Citrini Research 公司的詹姆斯-范盖伦（James van Geelen）毫不迟疑地向他的约 5 万名客户发出了 "宏观交易 "警报。【原文：On Wednesday morning, as markets worldwide shuddered on news that President Donald Trump was likely to fire Jerome Powell, James van Geelen at Citrini Research wasted no time in blasting a “macro trade” alert to his some 50,000 clients.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所集团考虑 24 小时交易，英国《金融时报》报道
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，伦敦证券交易所集团正在考虑是否推出 24 小时交易，以满足小投资者日益增长的需求。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group is weighing whether to introduce 24-hour trading in response to growing demand from small investors, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 司法部调查 Libor 过渡期间 CLO 市场的合谋行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国司法部正在对抵押贷款债务的一些投资者是否串通一气，在 2023 年初市场从丑闻缠身的伦敦银行间同业拆借利率过渡时加强头寸进行反垄断刑事调查。【原文：The US Justice Department is conducting a criminal antitrust investigation into whether some investors in collateralized loan obligations colluded to bolster their positions as markets transitioned away from the scandal-plagued London interbank offer rate in early 2023, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者对收益的渴求推动 S&P 500 红利期权增长
item.description: 美国投资者对收益率的需求正在助推 S&P 500 指数股息期货和期权市场的增长；这是美国长期落后于欧洲的衍生品领域的一个小众角落。【原文：Investor demand for yield in the US is helping fuel growth in the market for S&P 500 Index dividend futures and options — a niche corner of the derivatives world where America has long trailed Europe.】

item.title: 完美定价"：关税阴影笼罩高估值股票
item.description: 华尔街的传统观点似乎认为，美国股市最近不断创下新高，是因为在关税威胁方面，唐纳德-特朗普总统说话声音很大，但拿的是小棍子。【原文：The conventional wisdom on Wall Street appears to be that the US stock market’s latest march to records has been unabated because, when it comes to tariff threats, President Donald Trump talks loudly but carries a small stick.】

item.title: 美元反思促使新兴国家出售更多欧元债务
item.description: 新兴市场借贷者正在以十多年来最快的速度开发欧元债券市场，以利用日益增长的脱离美元的多样化需求。【原文：Emerging-market borrowers are tapping the euro bond market at the fastest pace in over a decade, capitalizing on the rising demand for diversification away from the US dollar.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：欧元债券销售激增（播客）
item.description: Vinicius Andrade 和宋子嘉讨论了新兴市场借款人出售欧元计价债券的趋势，因为投资者希望从美国分散投资的需求日益高涨。【原文：Vinicius Andrade and Zijia Song discuss the trend of selling euro-denominated bonds for emerging-market borrowers amid rising investor demand to diversify away from the US.】

item.title: 中国和越南计划在美国加征关税之际举行首次联合陆军演习
item.description: 中国和越南计划于本月举行首次联合陆军训练演习，这是两国在努力应对美国关税政策的同时加深军事关系的一个迹象。【原文：China and Vietnam plan to hold their first joint army training exercise this month, a sign of deepening military ties as the two countries grapple with US tariff policies.】

item.title: 首款可折叠 iPhone 将于明年面世，其风格与苹果大相径庭
item.description: 当首款可折叠 iPhone 于明年亮相时，这将是史上最不像苹果的发布会。还有M5 iPad Pro 的性能将得到显著提升；Meta 又抢到了两名苹果人工智能研究人员；谷歌确定了 Pixel 10 的发布日期。【原文：When the first foldable iPhone debuts next year, it will be the least Apple-like launch ever. Also: The M5 iPad Pro is set to get a notable improvement; Meta snags two more Apple AI researchers; and Google sets the date for its Pixel 10 launch.】

item.title: Metrics Credit 称对监管机构 ASIC 的调查一无所知
item.description: Metrics Credit Partners Pty 表示，在彭博新闻社上周报道澳大利亚证券与投资委员会正在对该公司进行调查之后，它并不知道该委员会对该公司进行了任何调查。【原文：Metrics Credit Partners Pty said it’s unaware of any investigation by the Australian Securities & Investments Commission into the company after Bloomberg News reported last week that the regulator was probing it.】

item.title: 据塔斯尼姆通讯社报道，伊朗同意与英国、法国和德国举行会谈
item.description: 据半官方的塔斯尼姆通讯社（Tasnim news agency）报道，伊朗已原则上同意与英国、法国和德国就其核计划举行会谈。【原文：Iran has reached an agreement in principle to hold talks with the UK, France and Germany over its nuclear program, the semi-official Tasnim news agency reported.】

item.title: Al Futtaim Retail 斥资 6.66 亿美元收购 Cenomi Retail 股份
item.description: Al Futtaim Retail 已同意以 25 亿里亚尔（6.66 亿美元）的价格收购沙特阿拉伯公司 Cenomi Retail 的主要股份。【原文：Al Futtaim Retail has agreed to buy a major stake in Saudi Arabian firm Cenomi Retail for 2.5 billion riyals ($666 million).】

item.title: 马斯克称 xAI 将开发一款名为 Baby Grok 的儿童友好型应用程序
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他的人工智能初创公司将开发一款专门针对儿童的应用程序，并将其命名为 "Baby Grok"。【原文：Elon Musk says his artificial intelligence startup will make an app dedicated to kid-friendly content and call it Baby Grok.】

item.title: 台风韦帕逼近，香港发布最高风暴警报
item.description: 热带气旋韦帕逼近香港，香港将风暴警报提升至最高级别，国泰航空公司周日推迟和取消了进出香港的航班。【原文：Hong Kong raised its storm alert to the highest level as tropical cyclone Wipha moved closer, with Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delaying and canceling flights in and out of the city on Sunday.】

item.title: 日本选民前往投票站，石破茂的首相职位岌岌可危
item.description: 日本选民将在周日举行的上议院选举中对首相石破茂执政 10 个月的情况作出评判，这次选举是在对通货膨胀和与美国关税谈判悬而未决的不满情绪一触即发的情况下举行的。【原文：Japan’s voters will deliver a verdict on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s 10 months in office on Sunday, in an upper house election that takes place amid simmering discontent over inflation and unresolved negotiations with the US on tariffs.】

item.title: 英国政府承诺到 2030 年将污水溢出量减半
item.description: 随着整治污水处理行业的压力增大，英国政府做出了到 2030 年将污水污染减半的新承诺。【原文：The UK government has made a new commitment to cut sewage pollution in half by 2030 as pressure to fix the industry ramps up.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在特朗普贸易战的阴影下不会退缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行很可能会对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税所带来的经济危险保持沉默，选择将可能的借贷成本下调留待下一天进行。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to stare down the economic danger posed by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs by opting to leave a potential cut in borrowing costs for another day.】

item.title: 天文学家首席执行官在被酷玩乐队亲吻镜头拍到后辞职
item.description: 科技公司 Astronomer 的首席执行官在酷玩乐队演唱会期间被摄像头拍到与人力资源总监亲吻后辞职。【原文：The chief executive officer of tech company Astronomer resigned after being caught on camera hugging his human resources director on a kiss cam during a Coldplay concert.】

item.title: 垃圾债券投资者扎堆投资风险最高的债务：《信贷周刊
item.description: 尽管杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）和其他著名的市场观察家警告说，信贷的估值已经捉襟见肘，但美国垃圾债投资者仍在涌入风险最高的债券。【原文：US junk debt investors are piling into the riskiest bonds even as Jamie Dimon and other prominent market watchers are cautioning that valuations on credit are stretched.】

item.title: 据说珀闻即将达成收购软件公司 SoftNext 股份的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲私募股权公司 Perwyn 正在敲定收购法国软件公司 SoftNext 少数股权的交易。【原文：European private equity firm Perwyn is in the process of finalizing a deal to buy a minority stake in French software firm SoftNext, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 报道称巴西考虑对美国股息和科技公司采取措施
item.description:
在美国政府宣布撤销巴西最高法院部分法官的签证后，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的政府正在加紧研究可能采取的措施。【原文：

President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s government is intensifying its deliberations on possible measures after the US government announced it was revoking visas for some Brazilian Supreme Court justices.

】

item.title: 美国威胁因墨西哥行动而终止达美航空与墨西哥航空的交易
item.description: 特朗普政府威胁要撤销达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines Inc.【原文：The Trump administration is threatening to revoke antitrust immunity for Delta Air Lines Inc. and Grupo Aeromexico’s pricing agreement amid a set of new orders demanding Mexico move forward to address anticompetitive behavior.】

item.title: 美联储大楼翻新为何耗资 25 亿美元
item.description:
唐纳德-特朗普的盟友们正在攻击美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell ）的昂贵项目。这就是他在沼泽地建房的代价。【原文：

Donald Trump's allies are attacking Fed Chair Jerome Powell over the expensive project. That's the price he’s paying for building in a swamp.

】

item.title: 婴儿潮一代现在与全美大学的 18 岁学生比邻而居
item.description:
在美国学生注册人数不断减少、学校经费紧张、人口迅速老龄化的背景下，学校与老年生活的不同寻常的融合正获得越来越广泛的吸引力。【原文：

At a time of dwindling US student enrollment, tight school finances and a rapidly aging population, the unusual mashup of schools and senior living is gaining wider appeal.

】

item.title: 特朗普关税给夏威夷为数不多的咖啡农带来麻烦
item.description: 夏威夷咖啡农要向唐纳德-特朗普总统传达一个信息：对巴西等主要出口国征收高额关税最终也会损害他们的利益。【原文：Hawaiian coffee farmers have a message for President Donald Trump: Steep tariffs on major exporters such as Brazil will end up hurting them, too.】

item.title: 伊朗最大炼油厂火势得到控制：国家媒体
item.description: 据伊朗国家媒体报道，伊朗最大的原油加工厂--阿巴丹炼油厂周六发生的火灾已得到控制，没有中断运营。【原文：A fire that broke out on Saturday at Iran’s Abadan Oil Refinery, the country’s largest crude oil processing facility, has been brought under control without disrupting operations, state media reported.】

item.title: 美丽大法案的副作用--关税
item.description:
特朗普声称，他的 "美丽大法案 "正是美国经济所需要的

。【原文：

Trump claims his ‘One Big Beautiful Bill’ is just what the US economy needs

】

item.title: 股市狂飙之后，盈利不佳面临惩罚
item.description: 第二季度财报季已拉开序幕，消费者的力量推动了企业利润的恢复性增长。然而，股市的反应却相当平静，这是一个不祥之兆，表明大部分好消息都已被定价，投资者正在对失望进行惩罚。【原文：The second-quarter earnings season is off to a ripping start, with consumer strength powering resilient corporate profits. In the stock market, however, the reaction has been fairly quiet, an ominous sign that much of the good news is priced in — and investors are punishing disappointments.】

item.title: 特朗普会引发中印 "龙象探戈 "吗？
item.description: 在政治形象中使用动物性隐喻的远不止中国。毕竟，俄罗斯有凶猛的熊，美国有高飞的鹰，英国有勇敢的斗牛犬。但说到意象，龙是最难超越的。【原文：China is far from being alone when it comes to using animalistic metaphors in its political imagery. After all, Russia has its ferocious bear, the US its high-flying eagle and the British their plucky bulldog. But when it comes to imagery, it’s kind of hard to top a dragon.】
